parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Pointer to the CPropertyPage to add, cast to a long long

title: ISWPropertySheet.AddPagex64
description: Adds a CPropertyPage-derived page to an ISWPropertySheet in 64-bit applications.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Pointer to the CPropertyPage to add, cast to a long long

returns: True if successful, false if not
remarks: This method is only available through early binding and with 64-bit versions of the SOLIDWORKS Design software.
